text: Q: What is eZhire? A: eZhire makes it easy for you to get a rental car — from ordering and delivery to customer service and extension, our app features are powerful alone, but they're even better together. No deposit required.

section: How is eZhire different from traditional car rental
text: Q: How is eZhire different from traditional car rental? A: At eZhire, we don't require customers to provide a deposit on any car rental. This makes it easy and convenient for our customers to get the car they need when they need it. We're committed to making your rental car experience as frictionless as possible. That's why we don't require a deposit when you rent with us. We believe that deposits for car rental are a thing of the past, and we're excited to offer our customers a simpler way to rent. eZhire offers the fastest delivery, anywhere, on-demand, 24/7 as well as free pickup from one of our many locations in the UAE. When you're planning a trip, the last thing you want to worry about is transportation. With eZhire, you can easily order rental car online, so you can focus on what matters most: enjoying your trip. We're breaking down the barriers to car rental for as many people as possible. By making it more affordable and accessible, we're opening up new opportunities for everyone. eZhire wants to make sure that everyone has the opportunity to order a car, regardless of their background. We believe that everyone deserves the chance to enjoy the freedom of the open road. Unlike traditional car rental companies, we accept debit cards as payment for ordering a car.

section: What type of vehicles are available from eZhire
text: Q: What type of vehicles are available from eZhire? A: There is a wide selection of cars available on the app, and we can get you whatever car you want. If not, we’ll get you an upgrade at the same price. You can choose from economy cars like the Mitsubishi Attrage and Nissan Sunny to SUVs like the Nissan Pathfinder. We also offer luxury and exotic cars like Lamborghini Huracan and Rolls Royce Phantom.

section: Do you offer monthly car rentals
text: Q: Do you offer monthly car rentals? A: eZhire offers monthly car rental in Dubai at highly discounted and competitive rates. We have a large fleet of cars to choose from, so you can find the perfect one for your needs. Plus, our app makes it easy to reserve a car for any length of time. Contact us today to learn more about our monthly car rental services.

Q: Do you offer chauffeur services? A: Absolutely. We have a team of experienced, reliable, and safe drivers who will take you wherever you need to go. Our rates are very reasonable, and we always offer the best possible service. Contact us today for more information or to book your ride.
Q: What are eZhire’s operating hours? A: eZhire offers the fastest delivery, anywhere, on-demand, 24/7 as well as free pickup from one of our many locations in the UAE.

section: How do I order a rental car
text: Q: How do I order a rental car? A: You can order a rental car on the eZhire app, and get it delivered, on-demand. The app offers an easy way to compare prices and find the best deal for your needs. You can also order a car for as little as one day or for as many months as you like. So if you need a car for a short trip, or if you're planning a longer vacation, the eZhire app has you covered. Plus, there's no need to worry about hidden fees or add-ons; all of our rates are upfront and transparent. No deposit required.

section: How do I contact customer support
text: Q: How do I contact customer support? A: If you encounter any issues with your hired car, please feel free to reach out to us via the chat feature on the eZhire app. We are dedicated to ensuring that your rental experience is as seamless as possible, and we're here to assist you every step of the way.

section: How come you don’t require a deposit
text: Q: How come you don’t require a deposit? A: We want to make car rental as easy and accessible as possible, which is why we don't require a deposit. We believe that every person should have the opportunity to drive, and that's why we work hard to break down the barriers to car rental. Plus, our rates are always affordable, so you can get behind the wheel without breaking the bank.

Q: Can I extend my order? A: You can absolutely extend your rental from the app. In fact, we always recommend that people do it ahead of time to avoid any possible issues. However, please keep in mind that you have to do it at least 3 hours before the end of your rental. That way, you're not left scrambling if something comes up. For more, please check out the extension and collection policy.

section: Can I get the car delivered and collected
text: Q: Can I get the car delivered and collected? A: Yes, you can get your rental car delivered and collected from eZhire. It's perfect for those who don't want to deal with the hassle of picking up and dropping off a rental car at a rental agency.
Q: Where is delivery available? A: We deliver all over the UAE.

section: Can I make an order and get it delivered at night
text: Q: Can I make an order and get it delivered at night? A: Yes, our delivery service is available 24/7. Simply order your car through the app, and choose the delivery time that works best for you. We'll take care of the rest!
Q: How long does delivery take? A: It usually takes a couple of hours for your rental car to be delivered. You can track the delivery on the app.

section: What time is delivery & collection available
text: Q: What time is delivery & collection available? A: eZhire is committed to getting your car delivered to you when you need it most! We operate 24/7 and are able to deliver the car at any time of the day or night!

section: Can I pick up the car
text: Q: Can I pick up the car? A: Yes, you can pick up your vehicle from one of our many locations for free.

section: Do I need to be present during the delivery of your vehicle
text: Q: Do I need to be present during the delivery of your vehicle? A: Yes, you will need to be present when we deliver your car. We will need to confirm your identification in order to complete the delivery. Thank you for your cooperation!

section: What happens if I do not make payments on time
text: Q: What happens if I do not make payments on time? A: If you do not make payments, we will start the force collection procedure. This means that your car will be immobilized until you pay the amount you owe. We strongly advise against this, as it will only cause you more stress and headaches. Make payments on time to avoid any such issues. Thank you for understanding.

section: Will I be charged if I return the car later than delivery/self pickup time
text: Q: Will I be charged if I return the car later than delivery/self pickup time? A: Yes, the vehicle must be returned at the same time as delivery/self-pickup, If not then a penalty of 1-day charge is applicable. Collection/Self-return must be raised via the app at least 3 hour prior to your return time.

section: What is the minimum order length
text: Q: What is the minimum order length? A: The eZhire minimum order length for car rental is one day. This means that you must rent a car for at least one day in order to use the service. Thanks for considering eZhire!

section: Will I get charged if I cancel my order
text: Q: Will I get charged if I cancel my order? A: If you've placed an order and change your mind, don't worry – we don't charge cancellation fees if you cancel before the car is dispatched. Once the driver is on their way to pick you up, though, the fee will stand. If you have any questions, get in touch with our customer service team. We're always happy to help!

section: Which payment methods do you support
text: Q: Which payment methods do you support? A: We accept all Credit and Debit Cards. Upload your card details on our secure platform and we will handle the rest.

section: How do I add a payment card
text: Q: How do I add a payment card? A: To add a payment card on the app, you can either add it to your wallet or else during the ordering process. If you're adding it to your wallet, just open up the menu and select 'Add Credit/Debit Card'. If you're adding it during the ordering process, first enter your shipping address and then select 'Payment Method. From there, just tap on 'Add Credit/Debit Card' and enter all of the required information.

section: How do I remove a payment card
text: Q: How do I remove a payment card? A: Remove it from your wallet, and if you have an active order, you will need to replace it.

section: Is it safe to add my card details to the App
text: Q: Is it safe to add my card details to the App? A: Yes, our payment gateway is secure. We use the latest encryption technology to ensure that your data is safe and secure. Your card details are never stored on our servers, and we will never sell your data to third parties.

section: How can I check my order receipt
text: Q: How can I check my order receipt? A: After your order has been delivered, we’ll email you a receipt showing the number of liters dispensed, the price per liter, and the total amount charged to your card.

section: What add-ons are available with ezhire
text: Q: What add-ons are available with ezhire? A: Our add-ons include additional drivers, upgraded insurance, GPS, and baby seats. You can see the full list of add-ones here.

section: Can I add an additional driver
text: Q: Can I add an additional driver? A: Yes, you can add an additional driver while ordering your car, or at any time while you are a customer. If you are a customer, please contact the team via the in-app chat to add a driver. The rates are as follows: Daily: 25 AED / Day Weekly: 105 AED / Day Monthly: 150 AED / Month

section: What happens if an accident occurs
text: Q: What happens if an accident occurs? A: In the event of an accident, you must notify the police immediately. You should not move the vehicle until the police issue a report or advise you to do so. Failure to submit a police report will render you liable for all costs incurred as a result of the accident and will result in no insurance coverage. If it's your mistake and you are provided with a Red Police Report - maximum liability will be charged. If you decide to take full insurance for an extra charge, you will not be charged any excess for a Red Report as long as a valid police report is provided. Punctures, tyre damage, wheel caps, aerials, and windscreens are not covered by insurance even after getting full insurance coverage.

section: What are the traffic fines in the UAE
text: Q: What are the traffic fines in the UAE? A: The traffic fines in the UAE vary depending on the severity of the offense. As a general rule, fines tend to be higher for offenses that cause danger to other road users. To see the full list, please check out our guide to traffic fines.

section: What is driving like in the UAE
text: Q: What is driving like in the UAE? A: Renting a car and driving in the UAE can be an incredible experience, as long as you're aware of the unique conditions and rules that apply. In general, traffic is orderly and drivers are courteous. Lane discipline is usually good, and there's rarely any congestion on the roads. That said, there are a few things to watch out for. The first is that it's against the law to use your mobile phone while driving, so make sure you hands-free kit if you need to take a call. Secondly, there are special rules governing how to overtake camels on the road - make sure you familiarize yourself with these before setting out.

section: What side of the road do people drive on in the UAE
text: Q: What side of the road do people drive on in the UAE? A: People drive on the right side of the road in the UAE.

section: Are car rentals automatic or manual
text: Q: Are car rentals automatic or manual? A: They are almost always automatic. However, there are a few rental companies that offer manual transmission cars for those who prefer them. Just be sure to ask when making your order.

section: Is it safe to drive in the UAE
text: Q: Is it safe to drive in the UAE? A: Yes, it is safe to drive in the UAE. The roads are well-maintained and the drivers are generally very cautious. There are a few things to keep in mind when driving in the UAE, however. First, be aware of the high speeds that people tend to drive at, especially on highways. Second, make sure to always carry your driver's license and car registration paperwork with you when driving; you may be asked to show them if stopped by police. Third, watch out for camels and other animals that wander onto the road; they can cause serious accidents. Finally, drink plenty of water while driving in the summer months as it can get very hot and humid.

section: What is the minimum age to rent a car in the UAE
text: Q: What is the minimum age to rent a car in the UAE? A: UAE Residents:

section: What documents are required for UAE residents to rent a car
text: Q: What documents are required for UAE residents to rent a car? A: Valid UAE Driving License (front and back) Emirates ID (front and back) Valid Passport and Visa page

section: What documents are required for visitors/tourists to rent a car
text: Q: What documents are required for visitors/tourists to rent a car? A: Valid Home Country Driving License International Driving License Valid Passport with Visa stamp

section: Are there any special requirements for corporate clients
text: Q: Are there any special requirements for corporate clients? A: For

section: How do I dispute eZhire rental charges or fines
text: Q: How do I dispute eZhire rental charges or fines? A: If you're disputing fines related to your eZhire rental, follow these steps: Choose the appropriate authority's dispute page from the list below. Authority Dispute Pages: Dubai - RTA Dispute Page Abu Dhabi - Abu Dhabi Police Dubai - Dubai Police Fines Inquiry Ajman - Ajman Police Sharjah - Sharjah Police Ras Al Khaimah - RAK Municipality Violation Appeal Umm Al Quwain/Fujairah : Use the MOI app . Log in, select Help > Complain , and provide violation details. Complete their dispute resolution process

section: How long does it take to process a refund
text: Q: How long does it take to process a refund? A: Refunds are processed within 3-7 working days, depending on your bank and the dispute evidence.

section: Can I receive a refund before the dispute is resolved
text: Q: Can I receive a refund before the dispute is resolved? A: No, refunds are issued only after you provide proof of winning the dispute.

section: What if I lose the dispute
text: Q: What if I lose the dispute? A: If the dispute is not in your favor, you remain responsible for any fines or charges.
Q: What is eZhire's Privacy Policy? A: Please have a look at eZhire's privacy policy here .

Introduction
eZhire Technologies FZ-LLC and its subsidiaries (collectively, ‘eZhire’, ‘we’ or ‘us’) provide online car rental services for residents and visitors. eZhire is easily accessible and compatible with both IOS, Android, and Huawei phones. The website, mobile application, and associate services are collectively referred to as “the services”.

ents.

Services
eZhire provides a technology platform that enables users of the mobile application or website to be provided as part of the Services (each, an “Application”).
The application arranges and schedules transportation and logistics services with independent third-party providers of such services, including independent third-party transportation providers and independent third-party logistics providers under agreement with eZhire or certain affiliates (“Third Party Providers”).
Unless otherwise agreed by eZhire in a separate written agreement with you, the Services are made available solely for your personal, noncommercial use.

Eligibility, registration, verification
The minimum age for hiring a car is18 years for UAE residentsand21 years for visitors/tourists.
A validdriving licensemust be presented at the time of placing the order.
For UAE Residents:A valid UAE driving license, Emirates ID, passport, and visa page are required.
For Visitors/Tourists:A valid home country license, international driving license, and a passport with visa stamp are required.
For Corporate Clients (Etihad, Emirates, Masdar):Staff ID must be provided in addition to the standard documents.
Bookings that fail to meet the above eligibility or documentation requirements may be canceled or rejected.
Driving License Requirements:
The renter and driver must be in possession of a valid driving license. United Arab Emirates residents require a United

s may be canceled or rejected.
Driving License Requirements:
The renter and driver must be in possession of a valid driving license. United Arab Emirates residents require a United Arab Emirates driver's license. Drivers from GCC countries, Gulf Cooperation Council, are required to present an original passport as GCC identification cards are not accepted. Clients on resident/employment visas or visas under processing must have a UAE driving license. In some cases, If the UAE driving license is less than a year old, then a supporting home country driver's license showing that the driver has been driving for more than 1 year is required. Clients from Japan, the Republic of Korea, Greece, and Turkey are requested to have a translation of their driving license, which must be approved by their embassy or consulate. Clients from China are requested to have a notarized translation of their driving license.
Valid national driving licenses from the following countries are accepted:
North America:Canada, USA
East Asia & Pacific:Australia, China, Hong Kong, Japan, New Zealand, Singapore, South Korea
Europe:Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg

sia & Pacific:Australia, China, Hong Kong, Japan, New Zealand, Singapore, South Korea
Europe:Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Turkey, United Kingdom
Middle East:Bahrain, Kuwait, Oman, Saudi Arabia, Qatar
Africa:International driving license needed.
International clients also have to be in possession of an international driving license. Please note this may vary depending on RTA rules and regulations.

If a client’s driver’s license has been suspended, expired, surrendered, withdrawn, lost, or is no longer valid for any other reason.
If a client is involved in a traffic accident while operating one of eZhire’s vehicles.
In the case of a change of contact information: email address and mobile phone number etc.
If a client's credit card information changes.
By refraining from informing eZhire about any of the above-mentioned events, a client’s contract with eZhire may be suspended or terminated. Contingent upon the nature

on changes.

Clients agree to maintain accurate, complete, and up-to-date information in their accounts. Cancellations of Confirmed Reservations, Refunds, Vehicle Lease Subscription:
Cancellations of Confirmed Reservations and Refunds:
The client agrees and accepts that a confirmed reservation will be valid for 24 hours starting from the confirmation of the vendor, after which it will be cancelled automatically.
All cancellations of confirmed reservations by the client must be communicated directly to eZhire. If the client cancels, despite having confirmed their reservation, within 3 hours while providing prior notice to the handover of the vehicle, the cancellation will be processed without a penalty and the Lease Payment (or part thereof) that has been received by eZhire will be refunded to the Client. This is subject to any associated cost, including, but not limited to credit card fees.
If the client is cancelling the Ordering (Self-pickup) from the counter no amount will be charged to the client.

Payment, Security & Extra Mileage
Payment mode:
We accept all Credit and Debit Cards for rental and non-rental payments. All fees, penalties, and trip charges will be automatically deducted from the authorized credit/debit card provided during the Ordering. The client must ensure that the credit card information associated with Orderings is always up to date and that there are sufficient funds available to cover any amount owed. Fees and charges incurred by clients are not refundable except in the case of fraudulent activities not caused by the clients.
Once you submit your registration, there will be a refundable charge of AED 3.67 (or equivalent to US$ 1.00 for credit/debit card validation).
A refund can be done through the Original Mode of Payment as well as in the eZhire wallet. However, any amount which is equal to AED 20 (US$5.00) or lower can only be credited to the user’s wallet.
A refund can be done through the Original Mode of Payment as well as in the eZhire wallet.

s are solely responsible for all credit card, banking, service, cellular, data, or access fees or charges incurred in relation to any payment to eZhire in terms of insufficient funds or the use of any of the services and features.
For all payments taken against a client's credit card, eZhire will send a payment confirmation email to the registered email address. This will be sent within 48-72 hours of the payment.
Refund TAT (Turn around time) is 7-10 working days in case of any disputes or cancellations after confirmation. If a Ordering is cancelled before confirmation the amount is refunded within 24 hours
Multiple Orderings may result in multiple postings to the cardholder’s monthly statement. The cardholder must retain a copy of transaction records and Merchant policies and rules.
Prepaid cards are not accepted under any circumstances.

Early Return Policy:
The Early Return policy allows customers to return the rental vehicle prior to the originally Ordered rental period. Please note that rental rates may vary based on the original Ordering period and the requested early return date.
Normal Booking
Bookings of 30 days or more:
If a vehicle booked for 30 days or more is returned even 1 d

based on the original Ordering period and the requested early return date.
Normal Booking
Bookings of 30 days or more:
If a vehicle booked for 30 days or more is returned even 1 day earlier than the originally requested duration, and the actual usage falls below 30 days, the rental rate will be recalculated from monthly to weekly, based on the total days used.
Bookings of 7 days or more but less than 30 days:
If a vehicle booked for 7 days or more but less than 30 days is returned even 1 day earlier than the originally requested duration, and the actual usage falls below 7 days, the rental rate will be recalculated from weekly to daily, based on the total days used.
Subscription Booking
1-3 Months Tenure:
If the original subscription ordering is for any tenure but returned between 1-3 months: Charges will revert to regular monthly/weekly/daily rates based on the completed duration.
4-6 Months Tenure:
If the original subscription ordering is for 4-6 months: Early Returned within the same tenure before completion: 1-3 months tenure charges will apply.
7-9 Months Tenure:
If the original subscription ordering is for 7-9 months: Early Returned within the same tenure before completion:

pletion: 1-3 months tenure charges will apply.
7-9 Months Tenure:
If the original subscription ordering is for 7-9 months: Early Returned within the same tenure before completion: 4-6 months charges will apply.
10-12 Months Tenure:
If the original subscription ordering is for 10-12 months: Early Returned within the same tenure before completion: 7-9 months charges will apply.
All discounts will be voided in the case of early return. This applies to both normal and subscription bookings.

Late Collection/Self Return:
The vehicle must be returned at the same time as delivery/self pickup.
Collection/Self return must be raised via app at least 3 hour prior to your return time, otherwise penalty of 1 day charge is applicable.
Insurance and its criteria:
Comprehensive Insurance:
All cars come with comprehensive insurance as per UAE law. In the event of an accident or damage, clients must notify the police immediately and should not move the vehicle until the police issue a report or advise them to do so. Failure to submit a police report will render clients liable for all costs incurred as a result of the accident and will result in no insurance coverage.
If the police report provided is ‘Green’, clients will not be charged as this was not the fault of the clients.
If the police report is ‘Red’, there will be excess insurance charges depending on the type of car

is ‘Green’, clients will not be charged as this was not the fault of the clients.
If the police report is ‘Red’, there will be excess insurance charges depending on the type of car and the extent of damage caused.
If it is the client’s mistake and a ‘Red’ police report is provided - maximum liability will be charged (This only applies if additional full insurance is not included in the rental).
Hit andRun Charge Policy:In case of ahit andrun, an excess charge of AED 1250 for hatchbacks and sedans. For SUVs or bigger, a charge of up to AED 3000 will apply.
Full Insurance:
If the clients decide to take full insurance for an extra charge, they will not be charged any excess for a ‘Red’ Report as long as a valid police report is provided.
Note: Punctures, tire damage, wheel caps, aerials, and windscreens are not covered by insurance even after getting full insurance coverage.
For full information about insurance until caused due to an accident where a 3rd party is involved. Check outfull insurance details here.
Important Notein case you want to add additional driver, If the car met an accident on the same day the additional driver was added and a police report as well generated on same

e.
Important Notein case you want to add additional driver, If the car met an accident on the same day the additional driver was added and a police report as well generated on same day, that additional driver will not be covered by the insurance. Additionally Full Insurance will only cover any accident 24 Hours after insurance is added.
KSA Terms & Conditions:
Check outKSA Full Insurance details.
